thread.title: Bricks 4 Kidz Ranked 88th in Entrepreneur Magazine’s Top 200 Global Franchises
thread.title_full: Bricks 4 Kidz Ranked 88th in Entrepreneur Magazine’s Top 200 Global Franchises

title: Bricks 4 Kidz Ranked 88th in Entrepreneur Magazine’s Top 200 Global Franchises
text:
Bricks 4 Kidz Ranked 88th in Entrepreneur Magazine’s Top 200 Global Franchises Creative Learning Corporation 5 hours ago  Done 
ST. AUGUSTINE, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Creative Learning Corporation ( CLCN ), owner and developer of Bricks 4 Kidz, ® Challenge Island ®, and Sew Fun Studios ®, the highly-popular children’s education and enrichment programs, is pleased to announce that Bricks 4 Kidz has been ranked 88 th among Entrepreneur Magazine’s top 200 Global franchises. “Considering that there are thousands of international franchises, this ranking is tremendous recognition for Bricks 4 Kidz and Creative Learning Corporation, now that Bricks 4 Kidz is operating in nearly 40 countries,” stated CEO, Brian Pappas, “again demonstrating the huge international appeal of our franchise concepts. We’re looking to add a few more countries and master franchises in the fourth quarter.” 
About Creative Learning Corporation 
Creative Learning Corporation ( www.creativelearningcorp.com ), operating under the trade names of Bricks 4 Kidz®, Challenge Island® and Sew Fun Studios® offers educational and enrichment programs to children ages 3-12+. Through a unique franchise business model that includes a proprietary curriculum and marketing strategies, plus a proprietary Franchise Marketing Tool (FMT), the Company provides a wide variety of programs designed to enhance students’ problem solving and critical thinking skills. Creative Learning Corp is now operating in 40 countries.
